item.title: appsecradar welcomes you
item.description: A warm welcome dear friends to appsecradar.net. My name is Kshitij Badkas and here you can find awesome stuff and writeups in hacking, coding, bug-bounty hunting, and much much more… Blogs & Good Vibes! Currently, I am focusing on my OSCP preparation so the writeups would be of OSCP-like HTB machines and some VulnHub boxes. My learning resources include greats like Ippsec, Stok, Nahamsec, TCM, 0xdf, and TJnull to name a few.
